name: Dominus Solaris (itch)
description: Dominus Solaris is a shoot 'em up game inspired by old cellphone games. Filled with dozens of enemies with unique bosses, backgrounds, lights and retro effects. The game has a total of 6 rounds, each having 3 normal waves and a final boss. You can pick between three difficulties (easy, normal and hard), each having unique settings and score multipliers. Please unzip the game before playing.
